text: The Battle of Karbala took place on Muharram 10, in the year 61 AH of the Islamic calendar (October 10, 680 AD) in Karbala, in present-day Iraq.Madelung, Wilferd. "Hosayn b. ali". Encyclop√¶dia Iranica. Retrieved 2 November 2015. A small group of supporters and relatives of Muhammad's grandson, Husayn ibn Ali fought against a larger army serving Yazid I, the Umayyad caliph. Lohouf, Tradition No.177Lohouf, Tradition No.181 The Umayyads won. Shias every year commemorate the battle of the Day of Ashura. == References == Category:History of Iraq Category:History of Islam Category:680
title: Battle of Karbala
